name: Hunternet: Space Combat Unbound
description:
Enjoy deep and challenging space combat, from nail-biting duels to epic space battles. Equip up to eighteen abilities from Hunternet's legendary arsenal and pilot the most powerful single-seat fighter ever developed. Play in cockpit, third-person or top-down perspective. Dedicated servers for you to play with bots or with friends at any time. Join our community for weekly events with the developer.

  • Feature List (Main Site)
  • Community Discord (Text & Voice Chat)
  • Free for a limited time
